label: A3B4_cP7_221_d_ac-001
title: S$_{3}$U$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt ($B1$) structure} with the central atom removed in each cube. 
 The ICSD entry for this structure uses a = 5.505{\AA}, but (Zumbush, 1940) states that the correct value is 5.49{\AA}.  As this is consistent with the S-S and S-U distances given in the paper we use this value.
